title: Moby Dick: Revenge of the Whale
premise: The white whale isn't just a whale—it's a kaiju. Captain Ahab assembles a crew of monster hunters with harpoon cannons and steam-powered armor to take down the beast
style_guide: Over-the-top action. Steampunk whaling tech. Ahab as grizzled action hero. Epic sea battles. Crew of misfits.
